title: # 503 - Yannis Pappas & ME
itunes:title: # 503 - Yannis Pappas & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Yannis Pappas. We talk about Greece, growing up in Brooklyn, breaking up a dog fight with Whitney, the art of story telling, Kama Sutra, and much more! 

 

Follow Yannis

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/yannispappas 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/yannispappas 

 

Check out his Podcast “Long Days with Yannis Pappas”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/longdays-with-yannis-pappas/id1547367594 

 

This episode is brought to you by Liquid IV. Get 25% off when you go to http://www.liquidiv.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Draft Kings. Download in the App Store or go to http://www.draftkings.com 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer
